about.title: Hi, I am Oz
about.subtitle: This is my photography
text: I am just an amateur photographer who takes pictures for fun.
I have always liked taking pictures, and have always had a camera, from cheap disposable cameras,
numerous compact cameras, an old SLR with a couple of lenses and up until recently a mirrorless.
Earlier this year, just before lockdown, I treated myself to a DSLR camera, the Nikon D7500,
which I am liking a lot, though I am very much still learning to use it.
This website is simply a place to show off some of my photographs.
